metadata.synopsis: One liner for a follower of Umberlee. She's talking to Umberlee Follower 01 in a repeated AD.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to S_LOW_UmberleeFollower04_ba52a7af-885a-4298-9fe1-32bc8c67cc8a in the Waterqueen's house.

1.speaker: Captain Goldwake
1.text: Thought it wise to make an offering to the Sea Queen before sailing out tomorrow. Wasn't expecting to find the servants so preoccupied.
